title: New: Apache Jackson – BORED COPS
body:
Dark, broken and brooding RnB act **Apache Jackson** is back with his first piece of material in over 2 years.

The Portland native was one of our ‘sounds of 2012’, perhaps back then we had jumped the gun a bit, with only 2 EPs under his belt he still had a significant amount to prove. _BORED COPS_, see’s him take a refreshing new direction. The synths and bass are thicker; the vocals powerful, taking reference from **Gabriel Bruce**, and the overall pop aesthetic takes centre stage. Interested to see where this project goes again.

The Portland native was one of our ‘sounds of 2012’, perhaps back then we had jumped the gun a bit, with only 2 EPs under his belt he still had a significant amount to prove. \[…\]
